name: Bleeding Steam
description:
Bleeding Steam is a single-player or co-op single-keyboard game where the player(s) play as both the engineer of an airship and as the airship itself. The player(s) must shoot the enemy airship while keeping their airship up as long as possible.

Created for Global Game Jam 2020

Music by Gunnar Clovis

Sounds:
